trans-unit.source: Implements the `GetFrameworkPath` task.
Use the `GetFrameworkPath` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
For usage and parameter information, see [GetFrameworkPath Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GetFrameworkPath"></xref> class.
Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
There is no execution that takes place for the `GetFrameworkPath` task, instead the task supports only getting and setting of properties.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 assemblies.
The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 assemblies.
Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 assemblies.
The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 assemblies.
Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 assemblies.
The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 assemblies.
Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 assemblies.
The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 assemblies.
Path to the v4.0 framework, if available
To be added.
Path to the v4.5 framework, if available
Returns <xref:System.String>.
Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the latest version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies.
The path of the folder that contains the latest version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies.
